name: Shri Laxmi Industries
overview:
Since our formation in the year, 1979, we, “Shri Laxmi Industries” are considered one of the leading manufacturers and suppliers of a wide array of C.I. Agricultural Water Pump Parts, P.V.C. Agricultural Water Pump Parts, Well Jali and Aluminium Air Valve. We offer a large gamut of products under this range that comprises C.I. Air Valve, C.I. Ball Valve, C.I. Non Return Valve, C.I. Flange, C.I. Foot Valve, P.V.C. Non Return Valve, P.V.C. Flange, P.V.C. Foot Valve among others.

Our Team: Technicians Quality Auditors Research and development experts Engineers Warehousing and packaging experts

Our Quality: We are focused towards maintaining effective quality standards in the range of products offered by us. For achieving the same, we employ advanced technological equipment and tools in manufacturing these products.

Infrastructure: We are well aware about the desires and demands of the customers. For fulfilling the bulk requirements of the customers in an efficient manner, we have developed a state-of-art infrastructure. To maintain a swift rate of production, we have all the advanced machinery, tools and equipment installed here.

Client Satisfaction: With our persistent efforts, focused business policies and fair business dealings, we have established ourselves as one of the prominent organisation in the industry. Our entire range of products is checked on various parameters before dispatch so as to stand tall on the customers’ expectations.
